content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The groove's axis is oriented along the diagonal in the image, meaning it has components along both the X (right) and Y (depth) directions in the camera frame. First, define the groove coordinate system where the X-axis follows the groove, and Y/Z are perpendicular. A rotation matrix \( R \) is required to transform the stiffness matrix from the groove coordinate system to the camera frame.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [163.1, 86.6, 0],
    [86.6, 186.9, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
